data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
PDF::API2 is the next generation of Text::PDF::API with the
    following benefits:

    - cleaned up name-space hence the move from Text::PDF::API to
    PDF::API2

    - PDF::API2 aims to be full object-oriented to allow full mid-level
    manipulation of pdf-files (the underlying Text::PDF::* di low-level
    manipulation)

    - there is a PDF::API2::Lite module which aims to be a high-level
    wrapper around PDF::API2 for easy pdf-creation only

    PDF::API2 is similar in concept to pdflib or panda, but tries to be
    as xs-free as possible to ensure portability across platforms.

    its only preq. is Compress::Zlib and optionally WeakRef.
